loading and check

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

raw_ia_data <- read_csv(here::here("data/raw/results_survey669928_on-off_anon.csv"))

glimpse(raw_ia_data)

```

field formats

```{r}

ia_shortdates <- raw_ia_data |> mutate(
  date_submitted = as_date(date_submitted),
  date_started = as_date(date_started),
  date_last_act = as_date(date_last_act))

```

consistency check - 5 unique values possible for each indicator variable (+ empty) and these values go together.

```{r}
indicators <- raw_ia_data |> select(irm11:irm53)

for (i in seq_along(indicators)) { 
  print(names(indicators)[i])
  print(unique(indicators[[i]]))
  cat("\n")
}
```

short values for each score

```{r}
ia_shortdates_shortscores <- ia_shortdates |> 
  mutate (
    irm11_short = str_sub(irm11, 7, 7),
    irm12_short = str_sub(irm12, 7, 7),
    irm21_short = str_sub(irm21, 7, 7),
    irm31_short = str_sub(irm31, 7, 7),
    irm32_short = str_sub(irm32, 7, 7),
    irm33_short = str_sub(irm33, 7, 7),
    irm34_short = str_sub(irm34, 7, 7),
    irm35_short = str_sub(irm35, 7, 7),
    irm36_short = str_sub(irm36, 7, 7),
    irm37_short = str_sub(irm37, 7, 7),
    irm41_short = str_sub(irm41, 7, 7),
    irm42_short = str_sub(irm42, 7, 7),
    irm51_short = str_sub(irm51, 7, 7),
    irm52_short = str_sub(irm52, 7, 7),
    irm53_short = str_sub(irm53, 7, 7))
  

print(ia_shortdates_shortscores)
```

clean up on_off column, adding version column

```{r}

ia_short_versions <- ia_shortdates_shortscores |> 
  mutate(version = case_when(
    on_off == "offline" ~ "current",
    on_off == "offline - old 1" ~ "pilot 1",
    on_off == "offline - old 2" ~ "pilot 2",
    on_off == "offline - old2" ~ "pilot 2",
    on_off == "online" ~ "current"
  ))

  
ia_short_versions_clean <- ia_short_versions |> mutate(on_off = case_when(
  on_off == "online" ~ "online",
  TRUE ~ "offline"
))
```

filter empty surveys

```{r}

ia_short_notempty <- ia_short_versions_clean |> 
  filter(last_page != 0)

count(ia_short_notempty)

head(ia_short_notempty)

```

write to processed

```{r}
processed_data <- ia_short_notempty |>
  select(on_off, id, date_submitted, last_page, language, date_started, date_last_act, irm11_short, irm12_short, irm21_short, irm31_short, irm32_short, irm33_short, irm34_short, irm35_short, irm36_short, irm37_short, irm41_short, irm42_short, irm51_short, irm52_short, irm53_short, utility_code, utility_type, country_id, region, version)

write_csv(processed_data,
          here::here("data/processed/processed_data.csv"))
```
